title: James Gurley, of Big Brother and the Holding Co.
marks:
Signature; Date; Title; Mark
in pencil and in bla in pencil, on back: [Bob Seidemann]
description: contact sheet with 36 images, 16 upside down; various poses of a man with long hair wearing beaded necklaces and a large feather in his hair; some images with a large carved bow
